courses.title: Get started with DAML
courses.description: A short series of tutorials to learn the basics about DAML development.

courses.title: Fundamental DAML Concepts
courses.description: Start modeling your data in DAML, understand the 'signatory', 'observer' and 'controller' keywords and learn how you can write secure and privacy respecting DAML applications.

courses.title: Testing DAML Models
courses.description: Learn how to test your DAML models with scenarios and scripts.

courses.title: Upgrading DAML Applications
courses.description: Learn how to upgrade running DAML applications and migrate existing data to your new model.

courses.title: Deploying DAML on Fabric
courses.description: A short tutorial on deploying a full E2E DAML Application on the Fabric distributed ledger

scenarios.title: DAML Playground
scenarios.description: A playground for the DAML SDK
